frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-quick-menu
frozen.shortDescription: This is a fork of fedoramenu (which is a fork of Big Sur Menu by fausto) that scrubs references of Fedora by replacing the icon with the GNOME logo.
frozen.longDescription:
This is a fork of fedoramenu (which is a fork of Big Sur Menu by fausto) that scrubs references of Fedora by replacing the icon with the GNOME logo.

Quick Menu is a panel applet similar to the Apple menu found on macOS.

EDIT: This extension's purpose is dead. Check out Tofu Menu, which is fedoramenu, but with the ability to change the icon. https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/4272/tofu-menu/
